subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mark Cuban, the Mavericks’ owner, was at Barclays Center. Mikhail D. Prokhorov, the Nets’ owner, wasn’t. It didn’t seem to matter as the Nets improved their January record to 9-1.
snippet: Mark Cuban, the Mavericks’ owner, was at Barclays Center. Mikhail D. Prokhorov, the Nets’ owner, wasn’t. It didn’t seem to matter as the Nets improved their January record to 9-1.
